programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Broker Jasmine Xuereb must smooth the way for buyers Cindy and Andrew to decide whether they should buy a house in their homeland or in a different country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb & Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Marshall and Maria can't decide whether they should buy a property in Canada (Marshall's homeland) or Cuba (Maria's homeland).

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura Compagni teams up with Mataj Architects and The Parentela Family to introduce the first of the Hotel Vie chain of luxury hotels.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's friend invites him to an Indian wedding & tells him about his uncle who is looking for a luxury condo close to the airport. Daryl, Inez, & Jin support & donate to Mike's charity after winning a bet amongst them & the amount is determined by how long Mike lasts in the ring boxing against a professional. This client is looking for an investment property & a place for him to live when visiting.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jin's client lives a very active & busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business & pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Remarrying is hard enough let alone combining two families under one roof. With a total of 4 children between the ages of 7 & 16 Jin's client is definitely going to need lots of space & land in a safe neighborhood. Daryl, Inez, & Mike attend Jin's band practice to support her & listen to the set list they have prepared for an upcoming charity event. Jin gets her nails done frequently & this time Daryl decides to join her for some much needed pampering.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The King is back, baby! Daryl King is known to make an entrance, and he wants the houses he shows to have that same "wow" factor. His clients are looking for a grand mansion, and with their sizeable budget won't settle for anything less than spectacular.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent

programme.desc: This week's episode features Cambridge realtor extraordinaire Steve Bailey as he helps couple Dan and Melinda search for the perfect home. It's a real battle of contemporary vs. traditional as Dan and Melinda hash it out over where their future lies. Melinda surprises Dan with some new information, but can Steve surprise them both by showing them the perfect property?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E17 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vancouver-based couple Jim and Shannon are looking to relocate to their hometown of Toronto with their two daughters. With a budget of 10 million dollars, they enlist the help of savvy realtor Sofie Kehdi. While it might first seem that Jim and Shannon are on the same page, the house hunt proves that they have some differing opinions on what makes a good investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E18 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with a special appearance by guest agent Tyrone N. Steer.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E19 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Off on another adventure! This episode takes Mike Donia on a whirlwind tour of Southeast Asia as he searches for a home for his clients, Antonio and Kim. Featuring properties in Thailand, Indonesia, and the Philippines, each country has its own unique charms to offer the would-be buyers. Monkeys, mangoes and mansions are in store for Mike as he continues his hunt for that perfect property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E21 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. They enlist the help of Inez Kudryk to show them the best properties she can find in Toronto, and they are especially keen on the Beaches neighborhood. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E22 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vezi and Deborah love the house they purchased last season in Stouffville, but they are ready to make the move to the big city. Vezi works in the music industry, so Inez lines up some special surprises to wow her clients!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E23 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura and Steven are a young couple with an expanding family, and are ready to take the next steps in home ownership. They want a large plot of land for their young children to run around and enjoy nature, and a spacious home that reflects this new phase of their life. Steve Bailey is the man for the job, and with such great homes to choose from, Laura and Steve will be hard pressed to pick just one!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E25 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E26 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads back to Belize to help husband and wife team Rachel and Ben size up some resort properties. Along with their investors, Rachel and Ben are looking to purchase a resort on the island of Ambergris Caye that will provide the most bang for their buck. Each with a big personality of their own, it becomes clear this couple is not going to see eye to eye on what they want. Luckily for them, Sofie is a pro at mediating conflicts when it comes to real estate.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Julie and James are looking for a new home to raise their two boys. James is in the tech industry and would love an energy efficient home. Julie has her own dance studio and can't wait to get back to work after giving birth to her second son. Eve and Shawn are the perfect team for the job, especially with Timberworx's cutting edge "Net-Zero" project.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kevin is a retired, successful businessman. He is a single dad to Shannon and Jennifer. Shannon has been accepted into the Ontario Veterinarian College at the University of Guelph, which is Canada's leading program in veterinary health care. This is the reason they are moving to Guelph. Kevin is happy to live anywhere as long as it has excellent golf courses. Eve will be glad to tell him that Guelph just happens to have 3 of the top ones in Ontario.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura is on the hunt for a new home for long time clients Marino and Paula. The couple and their three kids would like a spacious house with a country feel to escape their hectic lifestyles. Due to Marino's busy schedule as a producer, he would prefer a house that is all-inclusive and turnkey. Their kids are very active want a pool and the option for horse stables. Laura's going to find them the perfect home.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Louise, Jason, and their two children have been living in Europe for the past 10 years, but now they would like to be closer to their family in Canada. Louise absolutely adores the European aesthetic; the sense of luxury conveyed by multi-peaked roof-lines, bay-shaped windows, and decorative stone. She wants a house that allows them the feeling of "living abroad" without leaving the country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Diogo is a dedicated musician working on his new album. He has been debating between moving to Miami or staying in Canada. Toronto is closer to his family and where he feels at home with his music. Danielle will show him some spectacular properties in both cities and see what he decides.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tomarra and Rob had just married and blended their two families. As a new family, they want to transition to a quiet neighbourhood away from the hustle and bustle of Toronto. Steve is up for the challenge. Rob is a writer and plans to work from home, while Tomarra is a naturopath who would love to have her own studio. Ultimately, they want to start cherishing the real things in life, and that is spending more time with their kids.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Darlene and Bruce are in the market for a new home and have enlisted Laura to help them out. Darlene's one request is that they stay close to their current home, where their daughter goes to school. For Bruce, quality construction materials and workmanship are of paramount importance. One thing the entire family agrees on is that the backyard should have a fantastic entertainment space since they spend plenty of time together outdoors and enjoy having guests over.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Kathryn and Neil are true urbanites. They love what downtown Toronto has to offer. When Neil found out his company was relocating to Guelph, they weren't thrilled. After five months of long commutes, the Thompson family is ready to take the risk and make a move-with some conditions. The new house has to have a pool and playroom for the kids and a large entertainment area for adults. Eve's challenge is to find them an enticing home that will convince their friends from the city to visit.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Stephanie is making a big move from BC to Guelph to be closer to her son John and his family. She doesn't want the move to be a hassle and is looking for an accessible, decent-sized home for her grandchildren and visitors from BC. Good sized guest rooms and a large backyard are a must. As she loves to cook, she would also like a new kitchen. Eve will show Stephanie 3 beautiful homes that fit the criteria. Stephanie is going to have a difficult decision.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S03 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey, Mike Donia and Daryl King review their favourite homes. Steve takes us down memory lane to his 18th century farmhouse, and another home with a stunning infinity pool. Daryl's listings range from King city to Caloden, with helicopter pads and sprawling backyards. Mike brings us back to his fabulous listings in Thailand. He shows us a home made entirely of Bamboo, and billion-dollar property.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: George is a retired basket ball player, and Mada is an international model. For a man over 7 feet tall, finding the perfect house might be a challenge. Danielle knows high ceilings come in all shapes and sizes, can she find a style they'll like? They also want a pool and a home theatre.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Wendy and Daniel are looking to downsize after their kids have moved out, but still want an elegant home. She's a physical therapist and she's a business analyst. They want something that can help them relax at the end of the day, with at least 4 bedrooms and away from the downtown core. Can Lou find them something that fits?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Danielle is helping quite a pair, Joseph is a chiropractor and Nadia is an aerospace engineer. They're looking for a home to start a family. Not only that, they want space to host their extended family. Will it be as difficult as rocket science?

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Janelle and Manuel are young professionals looking for more space. With one child tagging along on the tour already, they need a place for their growing family. They might need to do some renovations, but they want everything to be perfect.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S04 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: These two business owners Joseph and Heather work hard and want to play hard! They're looking for a place to entertain guests, and Daryl's got some amazing homes to show them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Phil and Aubree, a newly wed couple, are in the market to purchase a dream home in Castlemore.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Elvira and Robert are looking for a home with a history, but want to make sure it is post-renovation.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: When Dana and Eric aren't busy with their successful family business, they have their hands full with their 4 children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S05 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Nathan, a start up company owner and his fiance Kelsey, a owner of a holistic nutrition company, are open to purchasing a house anywhere in the GTA.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Broker Jasmine Xuereb must smooth the way for buyers Cindy and Andrew to decide whether they should buy a house in their homeland or in a different country.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Katerina and Mauricio are looking for one property in Canada and a holiday home in Belize, specifically on a private island.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Fernando and his investment group are looking to either buy or build a resort in Canada or Mexico with the help of Joe Petrella Construction.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Real Estate Agents Jasmine Xuereb & Laura Compagni team up to aid power couple Jamie and Jennifer in purchasing either a real estate investment in Canada or Belize.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: The brokers explore Central America to find real estate options that fit the bill for two buyers looking for a change of scene.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S06 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Since working from home has become increasingly popular, Paul and Sonia are entertaining the idea of living and working abroad.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike team up once again with local agent to find a unique opportunities for residential investments.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Alan & Amber are ready to buy the property of their dreams, and broker Jasmine Xuereb is ready to help!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Rick looks for properties in Canada and abroad; Tav Schembri suggests Caledon; Mike Donia recommends Panama.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Laura aids Nick Regina and Michael Succurro of Spark Financial Group in purchasing a smart property investment.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike Donia locates an ultra-luxurious, private paradise for two buyers on Pearl Island, Panama, boasting 30 km of coastline and a rich marine sanctuary.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S07 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Tav and Mike team up once again to find unique opportunities in Canada as well villas in Los Cabos, Mexico.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E01 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Downsizing can be a difficult transition & Jin's objective is to make it as seamless as possible. In this episode, Jin is getting outdoors by practicing archery with Mike but mostly just to compete for bragging rights. Jin's client is moving from a house in Port Credit to a luxurious condo close to the downtown core. They desire extra bedrooms for when their children are visiting, all the amenities, & waterfront views.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: It is time to upsize! Daryl's client is moving away from downtown Toronto because they desire a bigger space, more privacy, & tranquility. They have 3 children between the ages of 7 & 13 who need their own bedrooms & the lady of the house needs an office since she works from home. Daryl knows all about tranquility & goes golfing with Mike to discuss his client & Mike's listing for them.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Mike's couple is looking for their luxurious dream home anywhere in between Toronto & Barrie near HWY 400 in a prestigious neighborhood. They have a large dog, tall family, & want to start a family of their own. This means they are going to need a lot of space & want the house to be fully renovated or brand-new. Mike is the perfect agent for this couple because he lives, eats, & breathes the luxury lifestyle.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: An amazing beachfront property is what Inez's couple is looking for & these top million dollar agents are sure to surpass their expectations. Inez's client currently lives in a condo & have one child, however, they desire a home that they can comfortably expand their family in.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Somewhere to spend the rest of their days surrounded by nature sounds like a paradise to retire in. Daryl & Jin play some golf to discuss a potential listing she has found & Mike aids Inez in purchasing a new vehicle. Daryl's client has older children with their own families now so they are looking for a home with lots of land & nature. It is very important to them because they want to be able to have everyone comfortably visit & eventually retire here in a few years.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: A young trendy couple wants to start a family in Toronto but they need some help from these top million dollar agents. Jin is a natural daredevil & has always wanted to skydive with her clients. In Oakville, Jin practices at iFly that is an indoor skydiving facility. Jin's client lives a very active & busy lifestyle so they require somewhere with low maintenance but still has enough space for a big family. Inez takes Jin to her hair stylist Anastasia for some business & pleasure.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Moving in together can be stressful but fun because you are starting a new life together! Inez's client is selling their separate properties & looking for a house or condo in the city or beach area that is close to shopping, groceries, schools, etc. Inez's couple is not too picky & open to different kinds of properties. Daryl & Inez enjoy a beautiful bike ride along the beaches boardwalk to discuss her client & the perfect luxury listing he has found.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Agreeing on a vacation home is made much harder when these top million dollar agents have astounding listings. Mike's client is looking for a waterfront cottage with lots of land & privacy. What better way to check out some waterfront listings then from a helicopter? Debbie wants a family cottage that feels homey, however, Paul wants an impressive high-end cottage that he can bring his business clients to.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E11 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Now that Kristen & Kane have opened an office in Toronto, they will be travelling a lot from Vancouver & want somewhere of their own to stay in. Daryl & the other top million dollar agents have a wide range to search over because Daryl's client is willing to live an hour or two drive away from downtown Toronto. Daryl, Jin, & Mike meet up for lunch in Port Dover to discuss business & later in the episode Mike & Daryl get their hands dirty in the kitchen at Sababa Restaurant.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Many people enjoy staying busy & always having a project on the go. Inez's client loves to build & create breathtaking properties. On their next project, this couple wants an interesting property, preferably waterfront, which they can use for an investment property or to build on. Inez takes her client on a private yacht so they can cruise around Lake Ontario & discuss the client's wish list.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S01 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Deborah & Vezi are an international couple that want to live in Toronto for one year but has no idea where to start looking. Luckily for them Mike, Jin, Daryl, & Inez have teamed up to find them the home of their dreams. They agree to split the commission & throw a yacht party for the client's decision. Mike arranges a private plane for all four agents to go to Montreal & discuss in style what the client is looking for.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E02 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Will Daryl be able to dazzle his clients and find a property that will take their breath away? This episode features the first two of four properties, with a special guest appearance by Design Generation builder and designer Carlo Rinomato.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E03 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: International luxury realtor Mike Donia jets off to Thailand to work with a client and good friend of his, Mae. She is moving back to her hometown of Bangkok to pursue her modeling career, and is looking for the house of her dreams. Mike has his work cut out for him, as Mae's long wish list will be hard to achieve with her budget.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E04 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of a Bangkok real estate expert, Max Gloeckner, Mike is confident he can deliver just what Mae is looking for. This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E05 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Vicky is searching for a home in The Beaches for her and her family. No one knows the Beach like Inez Kudryk, so Vicky enlists her help in finding some stunning luxury properties to tour. With a grand budget and very particular tastes, Inez knows that Vicky will be a tough client to please.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E07 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Steve Bailey to save the day! This week's episode features the lovely couple Chris and Rosa as they search for the perfect home. While Rosa is mainly concerned with cutting down her commute, Chris just wants to feel a connection to a property. Luckily for Steve, he's got his sister Helen, an interior designer and home stager, to help sway Chris - and it works!

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E08 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Unfortunately for Rosa, she isn't seeing the benefits of moving to a town around Cambridge. Steve's got some neat ideas, but will they be able to convince Rosa? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E09 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: Sofie Kehdi heads to the island of Ambergris Caye, Belize to help a friend and former client, actress and choreographer Zuzana Marosová. As a public figure, Zuzana craves privacy in her personal time and is looking for a relaxing space to unwind with her children.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E10 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local realtor Daniel Hartin, Sofie sets her sights on the perfect home...and hopefully a bit of fun in the sun! This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the client decides to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E12 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: With the help of local agents Max Gloeckner and Nala Gill, will Mike be able to find a place that suits the whole family? This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E13 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: After helping them find a home last season, Inez is enlisted by Martin and Cheryl to help them find the perfect investment property. While Cheryl wants a property with minimal work and no landlord responsibilities, Martin is more open to renovations and taking on some of the commonplace duties associated with property management.

programme.title: Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.sub-title: S02 : E14 Top Million Dollar Agent
programme.desc: This episode features the last two of four properties, as well as the reveal of which house the clients decide to purchase, with special guest appearances by interior design expert Shelley Alexanian and guest agent Mo Loulou.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A woman comes clean to having drugs hidden where they can’t be seen. An inmate’s exotic makeup is cleverly created with candy and toothpaste. A couple is surprised to find that holding someone against their will is a felony. Doing the right thing turns into an extended stay for a woman with warrants.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S05 : E12 Throw in the Towel
programme.desc: A man arrested for domestic violence threatens to put all the officers in jail. Inmates on kitchen duty get into a fist fight over a dish towel. A woman unsure about her sexual identity is arrested for trespassing at a friend’s home. Officers find an unusual bit of clothing when a man is changed into a jail uniform.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers transfer an over caffeinated suspect to isolation so he can unwind. A man arrested for DUI while doing donuts in a mall parking lot asserts he was robbed. A jaywalking Utah man claims someone hit him on the head. A disgruntled detainee lands a sucker punch on a fellow inmate.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a disorderly man in the detention center is sent to the padded room. A Sarasota, FL man hurls insults at officers while in custody. In Portland, OR a drunk and destructive young man is placed in the drunk-tank. In Las Vegas, NV a woman tries to lie about the reasons behind her detention.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Salt Lake City, UT a combative inmate provokes the use of pepper spray. In Sarasota, FL a drunk woman is uncooperative during processing. In Spokane, WA a man attempts to flip off the camera while taking his mug-shot.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: Officers warn a man that dressing up like a clown in Texas is not a good idea. A shotgun is found in the hoodie of a man arrested for riding his bicycle without a headlight. A young couple wonders how pot ended up in their possession. Officers are surprised at the amazing amount of pot one can smoke.

programme.title: Jail
programme.sub-title: S01 : E06 Crack Pipe on Phone Wall
programme.desc: Chaos surrounds a routine medical screening of an inmate. In the prison phone center, a smoking pipe is discovered and a mystery ensues. A pregnant woman is investigated over potential sex crimes.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: The night of the Mayweather-Pacquiao fight a woman pummels a nightclub security guard for an unusual reason. A man who claims to have served in the military confronts a Lieutenant and threatens fellow detainees in the holding cell. A “Pac-man” fan has a spat with his Mayweather-backing wife.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: A vice unit interrogates several individuals accused of sex crimes. Suicidal threats provoke a high-stakes situation within cell walls. Unable to raise bail, a woman is incarcerated for several days.

programme.title: Jail
programme.desc: In Las Vegas, NV a man who insists he paid for a speeding ticket becomes so incensed that he is placed in a restraining chair. In Sarasota, FL a belligerent man accuses officers of touching him inappropriately. In Portland, OR officers help a young mother and her kids.

programme.desc: A man stages a sit-in in his car in an attempt to stop it from being towed. A homeowner denies that he’s selling drugs despite the large amount of evidence found in his home. A safe full of evidence is found during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: By running through a shower, a man tries to throw the cops off his scent. A belligerent man violates a restraining order. A husband and wife give the police conflicting stories during a traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A driver leads police on a slow speed chase towards Las Vegas. Three people are suspected of using contraband. A multi-neighbor dispute devolves into a fight involving guns and bats.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E34 Fast Pase Foot Chase
programme.desc: A high speed vehicular pursuit results in foot chase and subsequent arrest. Officers respond to a domestic call involving the residence’s girlfriend and her children who destroyed the man’s house. Police respond to a domestic violence call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S23 : E16 My Bills Won't Wait
programme.desc: A suspect calls the police and states that he wants to kill himself and any officer who tries to help him. None of the three occupants of a stopped car will admit to ownership of a bag of drugs. A man begs not to be arrested so that he can pay child support.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers conduct a sting using a decoy vehicle. A man with a knife flees the scene of a dispute with his baby mama. Deputies are dispatched when a man is assaulted with a shovel over twenty dollars.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man behind the wheel of a stolen vehicle leads deputies on a wild pursuit. When a man threatens his brother with a knife, Mom calls the cops. A young couple tell deputies conflicting stories.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The Organized Crime Unit places officers undercover as drug dealers on a street corner for a drug-reversal sting operation. An Officer responds to a domestic dispute call after a man's property is destroyed by his girlfriend's ill-tempered father. During a routine patrol, an Officer spots an intoxicated man assaulting a woman.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S26 : E19 You Didn't Get Very Far
programme.desc: A husky cyclist takes a spill when he tries to flee. Officers chase a suspect in a stolen car who says he was just fixing it for a friend. A man's denials of drug use lose credibility when cops find a meth pipe in his vehicle

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Undercover officers organize a sting operation to catch drug users. A woman attempts to conceal drugs in her mouth during a routine search. A repeat offender is arrested after threatening offices.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S28 : E10 Four Felonies and a Flat Tire
programme.desc: A car thief is foiled by dreams of fame. In order to catch an oblivious driver's attention, officers are forced to disable his car. A woman tries to evade arrest by giving deputies a fake name.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S24 : E08 You've Gotta Believe Me
programme.desc: A DWI suspect flees from police because he thinks they won’t believe his version of events. A suspect is stopped for jaywalking but when questioned she can’t keep still. A naive man leaves his car unattended for a moment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers give chase to a suspect on a bike. The passenger of a vehicle is arrested for possession. Police are given a classic "I'm holding it for a friend" excuse.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect plays it cool when officers try to match a gun to his holster. Poor choices in a parking lot inspire a life coaching moment. Cops respond to a call and learn that good neighbors do exist.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Detectives chase a suspect who wrecks his car. Police are called when a man headbutts his neighbor. Officers tend to a woman punched in the face by her husband while on the bus.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: At the conclusion of an extensive pursuit, the driver eventually loses control and runs into a stop sign. Officers stop a stolen vehicle leaving a known drug house.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A hit and run call results in the intoxicated suspect being coaxed out of his car at gun-point. Officers respond to a stabbing and the victim is rushed to the hospital by paramedics. Officers give a tour of a newly renovated jail in Maricopa County, AZ.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A wanted man complains of chest pain after he injures a fellow driver. An angry woman calls the cops over a spicy bag of chips. A violent man finally learns where his girlfriend draws the line.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer arrests a driver who attempts to swallow drugs stashed in his mouth. An officer arrests a repeated drug offender in an area notorious for drug trafficking. An officer pulls over an unlicensed woman driver who is arrested for providing falsified identification.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S28 : E21 Two in the Bush
programme.desc: One offender tries to make the rules after deputies place her in cuffs. An unlicensed driver speeds away from a stop with devastating results. Officers seek the truth from some evasive suspects.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S28 : E32 No Helmet, No Ride
programme.desc: A lack of safety equipment calls attention to a lawbreaker. After a man waves a gun around, officers search homes in the surrounding area. Confusion surrounds suspects detained after a car crash.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies prevent the delivery of a pillow stuffed with drugs. A disabled woman calls the law when a father and son get into a fist fight. Deputies confront an intoxicated man riding a bike.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers assist an off-duty deputy being followed by a vehicle trying to force him off of the road. An officer responds to a domestic disturbance call involving a woman and her cheating husband.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S28 : E17 The Young and the Reckless
programme.desc: A man with many warrants puts up a fight when faced with jail. A desperate driver makes a last-minute attempt to hide his crime. A teenager must join the workforce after he makes a costly error.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect bites an Officer while trying to avoid arrest. An Officer responds to a stabbing. An Officer is flagged down by a concerned group looking for a missing 4-year-old.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man tosses his stash after being pulled over. Officers question two men in a fight who live with the same woman. A man says his shorts are from a thrift store after drugs are found in them.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A speedy suspect makes officers chase him through a creek. A teenage Good Samaritan gets in the middle of a bizarre domestic dispute. After a woman destroys her home, she begs police to arrest her.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer assists with a burglary call at a mall jeweler. An officer responds to a domestic dispute call involving two newlyweds at a Las Vegas motel. An accident occurs during a routine traffic stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An after hours search of a park turns up a young couple in a porta potty. An extremely combative man refuses to surrender. A heated argument between best friends catches the attention of the cops.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers respond to a domestic dispute call resulting in an indecent arrest. Officers in Tennessee investigate a house known for drug activity. Officers in Southern California check in with a driver parked in a known drug hotbed.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Deputies respond to a fight between a daughter’s boyfriend and her mother. A woman lights candles after an attempted break-in. Police respond when an evicted tenant tries to reenter his old apartment.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E03 Gas up and Run!
programme.desc: A man is tasered twice after struggling with two deputies. A gas station fight ends in a foot chase. A deputy pulls over a pair of quarreling lovers after they run a stop sign.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed pursuit ends in a foot chase. Stolen property is found in a suspect’s car during a traffic stop. An altercation ends with a brick being tossed at a victim’s car.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A remorseful woman is arrested for lewd conduct during Mardi Gras. Officers are dispatched into the busy streets of New Orleans during the super bowl. Officers investigates a theft at a local store.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An angry customer threatens a store employee with a rock. Officers suspect the ‘medicine’ found in a suspect’s car is actually his business product. A stepfather gets into a fist fight.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: When a driver fails to stop, a freeway pursuit ensues. Officers investigate a suspicious car parked in a commercial parking lot. Officers respond to a shoplifting call.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A man is taken to jail in connection to reports of solicitation. Officers investigate a stolen Escalade. An officer reunites a mother and her 5-year-old son.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Despite driving a large SUV and trailer, a suspect tries to outrun the police. A driver tries to hide contraband on his person. Police are called into a domestic dispute involving a husband and wife.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E30 Follow the Tire Tracks
programme.desc: A decoy vehicle is strategically abandoned in a public parking lot. An officer responds to a burglary in progress at a tire store. Officers respond to a domestic call at a nearby trailer park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers wrestle an uncooperative driver to the ground after a traffic stop. Deputies search for a man who sent threatening texts to his ex-girlfriend. Two suspects are caught stealing gas.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspect claims he would have gotten away with his crime if it hadn't been for his girlfriend. Officers are called when a mother’s job hunt unravels. Deputies confront a nervous man with bad habits.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S29 : E27 The Truth is Key
programme.desc: A desperate suspect flees from the cops after shots are fired. A father and daughter are found in fear of a man wielding a screwdriver. The police catch a bunch of pretty women making poor choices.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A jumpy bicyclist mistakenly reveals more than he had planned. Officers search a building in an attempt to thwart a robbery. A frightened woman just can’t keep her cool when stopped by the cops.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue two suspects on foot who fled from a stolen vehicle. A drunk driver is pulled over after a brief chase. Officers receive a call for help from a juvenile about an attempted break-in.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspicious man attempts to flee Police on foot and is later arrested for possession. Officers in New Jersey charge a garage owner with receiving stolen property. Officers arrest a man after witnesses report purse snatching.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A dispute inside a nightclub turns into a street fight. A man patrols his neighborhood ‘Old West’ style. A K-9 unit is called in to track a burglar on the run.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A K-9 unit finds the suspect hiding in a shed. A cooperative suspect is faced with a list of charges. A motorcycle chase comes to an end after the suspect ditches the stolen bike and flees on foot.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers arrange a sting to capture bicycle thieves. An Officer conducts a traffic stop on a vehicle with fraudulent tags. An officer stops a vehicle after witnessing a prostitute get inside.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A teen leads officers on a dangerous chase yet shows little remorse once captured. A report of a person in distress helps officers identify a group of lawbreakers. A robber has a moment of honesty.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are called when a disturbed naked man covered in blood is spotted in a park. Officers find a nude couple in a U-Haul truck. A traffic stop over a minor violation turns into a dangerous pursuit.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S13 : E22 Four Legs Beats Two Legs
programme.desc: A suspect on a stolen motorcycle is apprehended with the assistance of the K-9 unit. An Officer responds to a domestic disturbance call after a woman "accidentally" stabs her boyfriend. A hazardous meth lab is busted.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An officer attempts to pull over a man on a bicycle who refuses to stop. An officer arrests two suspects involved in a drug deal who attempt to discard the evidence. An officer questions a driver leaving a known drug area.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A deputy calls for backup when he is outnumbered. A man gets more than he bargained for when he tries to assist his neighbor. A husband and wife are separated after deputies search their vehicle.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S22 : E26 Not a Momma's Boy
programme.desc: Officers are called to fight between a mother and her son. Officers respond to a man on a trolley hurling racial slurs at a passenger. A traffic stop uncovers narcotics in a young man’s trunk.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An inebriated man is arrested for peering through the window of a recovery center. After a foot chase, officers bring down a local felon. Police respond to a domestic dispute at a mobile home park.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers are dispatched to an apartment complex where a young girl may have been a victim of a sexual assault. An officer spots a speeding motorcycle and attempts a routine stop.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S15 : E34 Copy of Warning shot
programme.desc: Officers respond to an assault call at a local residence. A juvenile with a firearm is detained. Officers respond to a report of a man firing a gun in front of his residence.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A drug dealer swallows something suspicious as deputies move in to arrest him. Deputies pull over a father with his son in the car. A woman files a kidnapping report against her own boyfriend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: Officers pursue an SUV on the freeway. Deputies are called after an agitated man arms himself with scissors. A driver tells officers the illegal items found in his car was left by a friend.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: An extremely understanding cop gives a resistant suspect too many chances. A driver reminds us why we should never let a friend borrow our car. A man with a supped-up vehicle tells an awful lie to police.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A suspected copper thief plays dumb when the cops catch up to him. A jittery cyclist tries to get away with a slippery maneuver. A couple takes their bout of domestic violence to the streets.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: A high-speed chase ends when the suspect plays chicken with a concrete pole. An emotional man just wants the cops to give him a little kiss. A melee breaks out when a woman seizes her beau's cell phone.

programme.title: Cops
programme.desc: The victim of a home invasion was held at gunpoint. A man in a wheelchair is in a stand-off with campus police. Officers respond to a call about a knife-wielding assailant.

programme.title: Cops
programme.sub-title: S21 : E04 Settled with a Pipe
programme.desc: A man attacking a woman is tackled by an officer. A vehicle is pulled over for a drug deal in progress. A woman smashes a car window with a pipe in a fit of road rage.

programme.desc: Relive the decade of perms and shoulder pads! The unmistakable synth pop sound of artists such as Michael Jackson, George Michael, and Whitney Houston, is bound to remind you of all your greatest '80s memories!

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Chef Michael Bonacini uses the fresh ingredients from rich Tuscan soil to make regional dishes like Spinach Ricotta Gnudi.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Celebrity Chef Michael Bonacini explores classic dishes from the central Italian region, Le Marche.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: The secluded region of Abruzzo makes for unique Italian cuisine. Chef Michael Bonacini shows us diverse regional recipes like Rolled Meat Crepes.

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy
programme.desc: Pasta, bread, pizza dough! Host Michael Bonacini makes Apulian classics like Artichoke Cheese Panzerotti.

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: CombiNATION Plates is television's best travel show that never leaves the kitchen. Skilled Chef Craig Wong is your host, and prepare to be blown away by his takes on the foods of France and Vietnam. First up? A re-write of a popular Vietnamese street snack made with Clams and Sesame Rice Noodles. Next? Marrow Toast dresses up in its tux and tails for a version made with King Oyster Mushrooms and Sauce Bordelaise. The common ingredient is Baguette; check out supersonic versions of French Jambon Beurre and Vietnamese Banh Mi. The Big Dish blends delicate sole with ProvencÌ§ale flavour spiked Nuoc Cham and a crunchy Haricot Amandine inspired Vietnamese crepe.

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Go-to Indian menu item Lamb Rogan Josh is one thing, but Lamb Sweetbreads Rogan Josh with Aloo Gobi Foam? That's a CombiNATION Plates thing! Craig Wong is at it again in this USA + India episode. After India, Chef moves on to the USA to answer the question, 'is everything better battered and fried?' with his Country Fried Torchon of Foie Gras. The common ingredient for these two distant nations is lobster, and really, who doesn't love it? For the US, it's Lobster with Cajun Spice Grits and Pickled Okra, and for India, check out Lobster Curry with Coconut Milk. The finale features Catfish like you've never seen it. Cooked Tandoori style and served with Collard Greens Paneer and Peach...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Halibut is on the menu for Craig Wong's first stop in this episode of CombiNATION Plates for his Icelandic tribute, the firm, flaky fish is served with Lovage, BeÌarnaise, and Beet Glazed Turnips. Next, it's a Jamaican adventure on a plate featuring whole, soft-shell crab Escovitch, fried, doused in chili vinegar, and served with carrot meringue?! Check out the common ingredient: ice cream! With creamy Skyr style with Blueberries representing Iceland and an Avocado Lime sensation for Jamaica that only Chef Wong could pull off, made in mere moments with liquid nitrogen! The Big Dish is a you-could-only-find-it-here experience; Jamaican Jerk Spice Reindeer (yes, you read that right) served...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: If you are talking about Irish food, it's hard not to talk about Corned Beef and Cabbage. On this episode of CombiNATION Plates, Chef Craig Wong delivers his unusual take using Beef Cheek, modern technique, and a caraway-infused Carrot Terrine for fun! Next up is a tribute to Izakaya eats, featuring Tare Grilled Duck Hearts, Miso-roasted Mushroom, and Agedashi Tofu. The featured common ingredient is Oysters. For Ireland, it's Garlic GratineÌe; for Japan, check out the Kaki Yaki, oysters broiled with miso and rich Japanese Kewpie mayo. For the final dish, light up! Smoking is permitted! Check out blowtorch-seared and tableside-smoked Wagyu Beef, brushed with Irish Stout Teriyaki and...

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Hong Kong Foodie Favourites
programme.desc: Cantonese expert Mary Tang showcases traditional dishes from the Chinese coastal territory, Hong Kong. To kick off the episode, Mary rolls up and steams a batch of fluffy Shrimp Dumplings. Next, tender beef with chewy rice noodles and fermented black beans is on the menu. This dish is doused in a fun and tasty dressing featuring salty soy sauce, tart Shaoxing wine, sweet oyster sauce, and a medley of spices. With a sturdy clay pot, Mary then cooks up some savoury Chinese sausage and lays it on a bed of aromatic rice. To top it off, why not some delicious Pineapple Buns? These buns are pillowy and sweet; you'll be surprised to hear that they contain zero pineapple!

programme.title: Global Veggies
programme.sub-title: S01 : E09 India, Belgium, Italy, China

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.desc: What better way to feel good than delightful Cantonese comfort food? Talented home cook Mary Tang give us the lowdown on how to make crunchy, flavoursome Shrimp Toast. To spice it up, she boils a simmering hot pot of a traditional Cantonese soup - Congee. Normally eaten at breakfast, this delicious silky rice soup is loaded with succulent ground pork, earthy shiitake mushrooms, and aromatic ginger and scallions. Next, Mary swears that White Cut Chicken is the ultimate Cantonese comfort food. Slow-poached in juicy chicken stock paired with fresh broccoli and topped with fiery gingERS-scallion oil, this dish adds a little extra warmth to your life. For dessert, Mary whips up a batch of...

programme.title: Global Street Eats

programme.title: One World Kitchen
programme.sub-title: S03 : E04 Hong Kong Foodie Favourites
programme.desc: Cantonese expert Mary Tang showcases traditional dishes from the Chinese coastal territory, Hong Kong. To kick off the episode, Mary rolls up and steams a batch of fluffy Shrimp Dumplings. Next, tender beef with chewy rice noodles and fermented black beans is on the menu. This dish is doused in a fun and tasty dressing featuring salty soy sauce, tart Shaoxing wine, sweet oyster sauce, and a medley of spices. With a sturdy clay pot, Mary then cooks up some savoury Chinese sausage and lays it on a bed of aromatic rice. To top it off, why not some delicious Pineapple Buns? These buns are pillowy and sweet; you'll be surprised to hear that they contain zero pineapple!

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: CombiNATION time! Barbados is the sun-drenched island of enchantment where Chef Craig starts this culinary adventure. Check out Bajan Spice Snapper with Curried Pumpkin for a Caribbean taste sensation! Next comes a feast for the eyes with Oxtail PasÌŒticada from Croatia, served with a truffle sauce that melts in your mouth, and also in your heart! Turns out that both of these countries love... shrimp! Check out the Croatian creation with tomatoes and plum brandy; for Barbados? It's grilled with spice and dipped in mango-chili sauce. The Big Dish is Monkfish wrapped in PrsÌŒut, a smoky Croatian dry-cured ham, served with scotch bonnet-spiked tomatoes and Barbadian Cou cou made with corn...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: First up, Belgium is famous for its mussels and fries, aka 'Moule Frite'. Chef Wong has a unique take featuring Belgian beer steamed mussels salad, waffle cut fries, and potato-leek mousse. Next, Steak Madagascar is an old school fine-dining fave, this take, uses modernist 'spherification' for the sauce, and a vanilla bean rub for a steak that is decidedly not 'old school', wow! For a common ingredient, how about sweet breakfast? Belgians are famous for Liege Waffles, and Madagascar loves Mofogasy, a pancake made with rice flour and coconut. The final dish is inspired by Belgian Waterzooi, a root veggie stew, mixed with a popular Malagesy stir-fry with shellfish and pork... Chef carefully...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Tiraditos! No, it's not a joyous exclamation (even though it sounds a little like one...) it's a Peruvian dish that lands somewhere between traditional Peruvian ceviche and Japanese sashimi. Chef Craig Wong's version is made with swordfish and includes sweet potatoes pureed with spicy Aji Amarillo chilies. For his Lebanese tribute, check out Lamb Neck cured and slow-poached in olive oil for a melt-in- your-mouth result, paired with an intense, flavourful Black Baba Ghanoush made with charred eggplant and caramelized onions. For a common ingredient, it is two takes on potato: Lomo Saltado with grilled flank steak, and a cheese, herb, olive oil and lemon drenched Hasselback Batata Harra....

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: This CombiNation Plates culinary adventure starts in Portugal with a Scallop dish that features some of their finest ingredients, such as Port Wine, ChouricÌ§o sausage, Kale, and Figs. Next up is South Africa and the feature is an Ostrich Steak, served with native Cape Gooseberries, the bizarrely named "Monkey Gland Sauce" (don't worry, no monkeys and very few glands are involved). The common ingredient is Peri Peri peppers, featured first on a Grilled Sardine with Olive Soil for a peak Portugal experience, then on the Peri Peri Chicken dish that South Africa made internationally famous. The combination plate is always the big finale... Stand back in awe for Chef Craig's Giant Braaied...

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy

programme.title: Bonacini's Italy

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: CombiNATION Plates is television's best travel show that never leaves the kitchen. Skilled Chef Craig Wong is your host, and prepare to be blown away by his takes on the foods of France and Vietnam. First up? A re-write of a popular Vietnamese street snack made with Clams and Sesame Rice Noodles. Next? Marrow Toast dresses up in its tux and tails for a version made with King Oyster Mushrooms and Sauce Bordelaise. The common ingredient is Baguette; check out supersonic versions of French Jambon Beurre and Vietnamese Banh Mi. The Big Dish blends delicate sole with ProvencÌ§ale flavour spiked Nuoc Cham and a crunchy Haricot Amandine inspired Vietnamese crepe.

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Go-to Indian menu item Lamb Rogan Josh is one thing, but Lamb Sweetbreads Rogan Josh with Aloo Gobi Foam? That's a CombiNATION Plates thing! Craig Wong is at it again in this USA + India episode. After India, Chef moves on to the USA to answer the question, 'is everything better battered and fried?' with his Country Fried Torchon of Foie Gras. The common ingredient for these two distant nations is lobster, and really, who doesn't love it? For the US, it's Lobster with Cajun Spice Grits and Pickled Okra, and for India, check out Lobster Curry with Coconut Milk. The finale features Catfish like you've never seen it. Cooked Tandoori style and served with Collard Greens Paneer and Peach...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: Halibut is on the menu for Craig Wong's first stop in this episode of CombiNATION Plates for his Icelandic tribute, the firm, flaky fish is served with Lovage, BeÌarnaise, and Beet Glazed Turnips. Next, it's a Jamaican adventure on a plate featuring whole, soft-shell crab Escovitch, fried, doused in chili vinegar, and served with carrot meringue?! Check out the common ingredient: ice cream! With creamy Skyr style with Blueberries representing Iceland and an Avocado Lime sensation for Jamaica that only Chef Wong could pull off, made in mere moments with liquid nitrogen! The Big Dish is a you-could-only-find-it-here experience; Jamaican Jerk Spice Reindeer (yes, you read that right) served...

programme.title: CombiNation Plates
programme.desc: If you are talking about Irish food, it's hard not to talk about Corned Beef and Cabbage. On this episode of CombiNATION Plates, Chef Craig Wong delivers his unusual take using Beef Cheek, modern technique, and a caraway-infused Carrot Terrine for fun! Next up is a tribute to Izakaya eats, featuring Tare Grilled Duck Hearts, Miso-roasted Mushroom, and Agedashi Tofu. The featured common ingredient is Oysters. For Ireland, it's Garlic GratineÌe; for Japan, check out the Kaki Yaki, oysters broiled with miso and rich Japanese Kewpie mayo. For the final dish, light up! Smoking is permitted! Check out blowtorch-seared and tableside-smoked Wagyu Beef, brushed with Irish Stout Teriyaki and...

programme.title: Above the Dolomites
programme.desc: Featuring cinematography by new collaborator Ryan Shirley and synchronized to new healing music by Antonio Resende; offering some views that showcase the Dolomites mountain range.

programme.title: A Day in Paradise
programme.desc: Filmed in 2013 by David Huting, the tiny island is hidden off of the northeastern coast of the outer Fiji Islands (near Taveuni), and boasts a perfect white sandy beach, groves of palm trees, and a majestic lagoon that shelters the island from all sides. It has more turtle visitors than humans!

programme.title: A Day in the Caribbean
programme.desc: The tropical island of Antigua.

programme.title: A Day in Santorini
programme.desc: A visual journey through the coastal village of Oia, found on the far tip of Santorini Island.

programme.title: Atuh Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Take a tour of beautiful Indonesian waters, surrounded by impressive rock formations.

programme.title: Gentle Creek: British-Columbia
programme.desc: Admire the twin summits, lush valley, and sparkling creek of Golden Ears Provincial Park in British-Columbia.

programme.title: Beyond Infinity 1
programme.desc: Soaring away to different galaxies rich in colors and computer-generated space visuals; paired with spacious ambient instrumental music created for immersive relaxation; featuring visuals and music by Dutch artist Nimanty.

programme.title: Dazzling Blue Lakeshore
programme.desc: Relaxing on the blue shoreline of New Zealand's famous Lake Pukaki; filmed in January 2017 on New Zealand's South Island.

programme.title: Above the Fiji Islands
programme.desc: Featuring aerial views of remote South Pacific islands, accompanied by nature sounds and ambient music by Relax Moods; offering a mix of ground-level and bird's-eye perspectives through smooth, continuous shots, concluding with a real-time sunset over the sea.

programme.title: Atuh Beach: Indonesia
programme.desc: Take a tour of beautiful Indonesian waters, surrounded by impressive rock formations.

programme.title: New Zealand Gardens
programme.desc: The filmmaker explores the breath-taking gardens of New Zealand and provides the diversity and beauty of these enchanting havens.

programme.title: America From Above
programme.desc: Part one of a new series of ambient drone films for relaxation, America From Above is a spectacular yet ultra-soothing 1-hour long natural journey that sweeps viewers gently above America's vistas. You'll begin the farmlands of Iowa, soaring west through the Rocky Mountains of Colorado, then on to Utah's iconic red rock landscapes and finally ending on the West Coast with a familiar voyage over Big Sur and then back to San Diego just in time for sunset.

programme.title: A Day in San Diego
programme.desc: Featuring 12 different 15-minute scenes from the San Diego's beaches, Coronado Beach, Pacific Beach, Mission Beach, Blacks Beach, Ocean Beach, Sunset Cliffs, Torrey Pines and more.

programme.title: Beach of Australia
programme.desc: Australia's rugged beauty.

programme.title: Auckland Beaches: New Zealand
programme.desc: The relaxing vibe of a day at the beach, with a tour of the breathtaking coastlines near Auckland.

programme.title: Beneath the Sea
programme.desc: A look at a compilation of spectacular underwater images from around the world.

programme.title: Beach Paradise: East Bali
